biotools.summary: This tool was developed for analyzing data derived from Methylated DNA ImmunoPrecipitation (MeDIP) experiments followed by sequencing (MeDIP-seq). However, it provides functionalities for the analysis of any kind of quantitative sequencing data (e.g. ChIP-seq, MBD-seq, CMS-seq and others) including calculation of differential coverage between groups of samples and saturation and correlation analysis.

bioschemas.name: MEDIPS
